original: siddhaṃ prasiddhaṃ vijitāmaraṃ ca śāntaṃ virāgaṃ suviśuddhaśīlam |
analyzed: siddham prasiddham vijita amaram ca śāntam virāgam su viśuddha śīlam

original: viśveśvaraṃ sarvaguṇākaraṃ vai śrīśākyasiṃhaṃ praṇamāmi nityam || 1 ||
analyzed: viśveśvaram sarva guṇa ākaram vai śrī śākyasiṃham praṇamāmi nityam
chatra ābha śīrṣam vara nīla keśam ca ūrṇā su śobham hi mahā lalāṭam

original: nīlotpalābhaṃ nayanaṃ viśālaṃ śrīśākyasiṃhaṃ praṇamāmi nityam || 2 ||
analyzed: nīlotpala ābham nayanam viśālam śrī śākyasiṃham praṇamāmi nityam
uttuṅga nāsam bhara pīna gaṇḍam bimba oṣṭha kalpam mṛgarāja vakṣasam
uttapta hema ābha suvarṇa varṇam śrī śākyasiṃham praṇamāmi nityam
pāyodha koṣam śubha karṇa śobham gaṇḍaḥ tri rekhā vara caila bhūṣam
prājānu bāhum dvipa nāsa kalpam śrī śākyasiṃham praṇamāmi nityam
vicitra puṣpaiḥ narayā akṣamānam śrīvatsa bhadra dvi gaṇa upayuktam
aśīti su vyañjana gātra śobham śrī śākyasiṃham praṇamāmi nityam
śāstāram agryam nara vīra vīram māyā sutam kāruṇikam jinendram

original: śauddhodaniṃ lokavidaṃ munīndraṃ śrīśākyasiṃhaṃ praṇamāmi nityam || 6 ||
analyzed: śauddhodanim loka vidam muni indram śrī śākyasiṃham praṇamāmi nityam
cakra aṅka pāṇim nava pallava ābham matta ibha līlā gamanam virājam
deva asuraiḥ vandita pāda yugmam śrī śākyasiṃham praṇamāmi nityam

original: traiduḥkhaduḥkhād bhayavedilokān trāṇaṃ ca nītuṃ varabodhimātraiḥ |
analyzed: traiduḥkha duḥkhāt bhaya vedi lokān trāṇam ca nītum vara bodhi mātraiḥ

original: jihvā ca mattehi sucakṣu sarvaṃ śrīśākyasiṃhaṃ praṇamāmi nityam || 8 ||
analyzed: jihvā ca mattā ihi su cakṣu sarvam śrī śākyasiṃham praṇamāmi nityam
